PERSONAL DETAILS
Location: 		The Netherlands
QUALIFICATIONS
MAVO Diploma, D-level (1996 – 2000)
ICT-academie, Level 4, (highest level of difficulty available), Data Communications (2001)
Languages:
Dutch – Native / Mother tongue
English (Fluent)
German (Moderate)
CAREER SUMMARY
2017 to date: Most Recent Company
Position: Senior Sales Engineer
A world leader in AI-driven threat detection and response (NDR) for cloud, data center and enterprise networks
First man on the ground in the BeNeLux region before then expanding to manage the company’s activities in the Nordics and Eastern Europe.
Strong enterprise customer focus with extensive engagements with both technical and non-technical stakeholders to drive deal progression.
Enabled channel partners and supported direct and indirect sales processes.
Strong interaction with internal teams such as Product Management, Marketing, and leadership to drive improvements and expansion.
2015 – 2017 Previous Company
Position: Pre-Sales Engineer, BeNeLux and DACH
Company provides an IPFIX (NetFlow)-based product which allows for multiple use cases such as Network Performance Management (NPM), Anomaly Detection (ADS), Application Performance Monitoring (APM) and DDoS detection.
The product can also be used for data retention purposes.
Strong interaction with both C-Level management, networking, and security departments. Providing insight from the network level is key for security behaviour monitoring.
As first Pre-Sales Engineer for the company in Western Europe, his main responsibility was to support the sales teams in various regions. Combining commercial insight and technical knowhow, his core focus was on the BeNeLux market while supporting larger enterprise potentials in other regions.
Activities in this role included product/vendor introductions, attending events, organizing regular update sessions with key-customers and partners, guiding PoC deployments, and liaising with the CTO and product development.
2010 – 2015 TechAccess
Position: Technical Consultant & Pre-Sales Engineer
A leading value-added IT distributor, providing end-to-end business solutions to the enterprise and mid-market sectors.
As a Technical Consultant, he was responsible for pre-sales, post-sales, consultancy projects, and training delivery for their customers. His core focus was on networking and security products, ensuring compatibility and compliancy throughout the network and security infrastructure from L1-L7.
The Pre-Sales responsibilities included gathering customer statements and determining a solution for their needs, presenting this based on slideware, demo’s and PoC’s.
Security focus was on Firewall (traditional and ngfw/utm), IPS, Authentication, AV, web-filtering, QoS, APT’s, anti-spam, redundancy, architectural design. Network focus was on routing and switching, vlans, link aggregation, dynamic routing protocols, QoS, DNS, DHCP, IPAM, DDoS Detection, redundancy, and performance.
2006 – 2010 ACAL Nederland B.V. (Acquired by Avnet Technology Solutions)
Position: Technical Service Engineer
Configuration, deployment and troubleshooting routers switches and firewalls from various vendors such as Cisco, Extreme, Juniper, Brocade/Foundry, CheckPoint.
2005 – 2006 Netguard Internet Solutions B.V.
Position: Network Engineer
Configuring and maintaining routers and switches for customers, as well as their own infrastructure in the DC.
Setup and maintained various servers on Windows, Linux, and FreeBSD for business-critical systems.
COMMENTS
Highly motivated and dedicated IT specialist with a focus on enterprise security.
For further information please contact David Beeston on 01695 570 696 or email davidb@johnston-vere.co.uk
